name: Fall Dice
description:
Match your dice's bottom side digit with the Checker Tiles' digits and  go to next level!

Controls:    
Up Arrow -> Roll Up    
 Down Arrow -> Roll Down  
 Left Arrow -> Roll Left     
 Right Arrow -> Roll Right

CREDITS:
Dice  Asset:   https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/dice-d6-game-ready-pbr-2001...
SkyBox Asset: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-stylized-sk...
Music: Boards of Canada - Kid for Today
SFX:
